summary: TAKATA RECALLS:  THIS HAS GONE ON FOR TOO LONG.  THE NHTSA IS NOT PUTTING ENOUGH PRESSURE ON GETTING THESE AIRBAGS REPLACED.  VEHICLES SHOULD BE "GROUNDED" AND A FREE RENTAL PROVIDED AND THAT WILL GET SOME ACTION.  ONCE THE GOVERNMENT REACHED A SETTLED ANY EFFORTS FOR GETTING THE ISSUE RESOLVED STOPPED.
